entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Lloydminster
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:30 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -9.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lloydminster Airport 10:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -9.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -11.0°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
